Wheal Maid (nke a na-akpọkwa Wheal Maiden) bụ ebe a na-egwupụta ihe n'oge gara aga na mba Camborne-Redruth-St Day Mining District, 1.5 km n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke St Day.

N'etiti afọ 1800 nakwa n'afọ 1840, a na-ekwu na uru ya ruru £ 200,000. N'afọ 1852, e jikọtara ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na Poldice Mine na Carharrack Mine ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka St Day United mine. N'ime afọ 1970 nakwa n'afọ 1980, a gbanwere ebe a na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ọdọ mmiri ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka isi maka ebe abụọ ọzọ a na-egwu ihe n'akụkụ: Ugwu Wellington na Wheal Jane.

E nwere aro na enwere ike iji ebe a na-egwupụta ihe dị ka ebe a na'ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa maka ihe mkpofu si New York na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik nke ga-emepụta ihe ruru megawatts 40 nke ọkụ eletrik; ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ na Cornwall County Council, na Doris Ansari, onye isi oche nke kọmitii atụmatụ kansụl ahụ, na-ekwu na echiche ahụ "eyighị ka ihe dị mma nyere maka Cornwall.

Gwennap District Council zụrụ saịtị ahụ n'aka Carnon Enterprises na ọnụahịa ruru £ 1 n'afọ 2002. Nnyocha nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Gburugburu Ebe Obibi nke kwubiri n'afọ 2007 chọpụtara na ala dị nso n'ebe a na-egwupụta ihe nwere oke arsenic, ọla kọpa na zinc na site n'afọ 2012, a na-ewere ya dị ka ihe dị ize ndụ maka ọrụ mmadụ.
Ebe a na-egwupụta ihe na-enweta nlebara anya n'oge ọkọchị mgbe ọdọ mmiri ahụ kpọnwụrụ ma hapụ ntụpọ na-egbuke egbuke n'akụkụ olulu na àkwà.

N'afọ 2014, otu nwoke dị afọ iri asaa na abụọ (72) si Falmouth nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ mgbe ihe e chere na mbụ na ọ bụ ihe mberede ịnyịnya ígwè. E mechara chọpụta na e gburu nwoke ahụ. A mara onye dị afọ 34 ikpe ma maa ya ikpe ndụ ya niile na ije ozi ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 28 n'ihi ọnwụ nwoke ahu.
